name: Timelooper (Ben James)
description:
You are your own enemy.. but also your ally.

Every 10 seconds your past self will appear at the beginning, repeating everything you just did. Use this to your advantage to open doors and progress to the exit. Collect all gems in the area to activate the exit.

Do not come into contact with your pat self!

Made in 3 days for Mini Jam 111

Follow me on Twitter
